name: Shadi Al Milhem
roleDescription: Web designer and developer specializing in modern web experiences.

hero.about: I'm Shadi, I bridge design and technology to create seamless web experiences. Focused on responsive design, performance optimization, and clean code architecture.

about.heading: Iâ€™m Shadi. I Build digital solutions from Syria to the world

paragraph.paragraph1: My coding journey began at 14 years old modifying WordPress themes, which evolved into full-stack development expertise. I've since delivered solutions for startups and enterprises across MENA and Europe.
paragraph.paragraph2: Specializing in the JavaScript ecosystem, I architect scalable applications using modern frameworks while maintaining a strong focus on core web fundamentals and UX principles.
paragraph.paragraph3: When not coding, I contribute to open-source projects and mentor aspiring developers in my community through coding workshops and tech meetups.
paragraph.paragraph4: Currently leading frontend developer while consulting for international clients on complex web application projects.
